column1: Uchi////I had pretty low expectations coming here as I was afraid it was too fusion-ey and not traditional enough.  While in a lot of ways my assumption/fear was correct
column2: it also pleasantly surprised me in many ways. The first time I came here we had a reservation
column3: the 2nd time we were able to sneak in on a friday night without waiting which was pretty incredible.  I will say the cocktail menu is very limited so you should just go with sake
column4: and you can never go wrong with otokoyama
column5: its good for drinking alone or with sushi.
